titleStmt.title: Sixteen antiquæries propounded to the catechiser of Diotrephes.
titleStmt.author: R. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes for Stephen Bowtell,

notesStmt.note: In response to: Prynne, William. Diotrephes catechised.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts), and the Gonville and Caius (University of Cambridge) Library.
